mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, is_pinned, file_no, u_no) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{isPinned}, #{fileNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uNo})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM notice
WHERE (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY n_created DESC LIMIT 2

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice
WHERE (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )

SELECT n.*, f.*, m.username AS uNm FROM notice n LEFT JOIN member m USING(u_no) LEFT JOIN file f ON n.file_no = f.file_no WHERE n.is_pinned = #{isPinned}
AND (
(SELECT user_type FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) != 'DOCTOR'
OR ( (SELECT user_type FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) = 'DOCTOR' AND ( n.u_no = #{uNo} OR m.h_no = (SELECT h_no FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) ) ) )
AND ( n.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR n.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY n.title DESC
ORDER BY n.n_created DESC
LIMIT 3
LIMIT #{row}, ${8-topCnt}
SELECT n.*, f.file_name FROM notice n LEFT JOIN file f USING(file_no) WHERE n_no = #{nNo}

SELECT n.n_no,n.title FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.u_no = m.u_no WHERE n_no < #{nNo}
AND (
(SELECT user_type FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) != 'DOCTOR'
OR ( (SELECT user_type FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) = 'DOCTOR' AND ( n.u_no = #{uNo} OR m.h_no = (SELECT h_no FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) ) ) )
ORDER BY n_no DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT n.n_no,n.title FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.u_no = m.u_no WHERE n_no > #{nNo}
AND (
(SELECT user_type FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) != 'DOCTOR'
OR ( (SELECT user_type FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) = 'DOCTOR' AND ( n.u_no = #{uNo} OR m.h_no = (SELECT h_no FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) ) ) )
ORDER BY n_no ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.u_no = m.u_no WHERE is_pinned = #{isPinned}
AND (
(SELECT user_type FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) != 'DOCTOR'
OR ( (SELECT user_type FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) = 'DOCTOR' AND ( n.u_no = #{uNo} OR m.h_no = (SELECT h_no FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}) ) ) )
AND ( n.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR n.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
SELECT username FROM member WHERE u_no = #{uNo}
